text: Pelion or Pelium may refer to: *Pelion, a mountain range in Thessaly, Greece *49036 Pelion, an asteroid named after the mountain *Pelion (Chaonia), a fortified settlement in the borderlands of Illyria and Macedonia *Pelion (Thessaly), a city in ancient Thessaly, Greece *Pelion, South Carolina, United States *Pelion Mountain, mountain in Canada *Pelion Range, mountain in Tasmania, Australia *SS Pilion, a ship
title: Pelion (disambiguation)
